subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: At 73 years old, Leta Andrews is the winningest high school basketball coach in the country, averaging 27 victories a season. She does it by giving her best, and demanding it.
snippet: At 73 years old, Leta Andrews is the winningest high school basketball coach in the country, averaging 27 victories a season. She does it by giving her best, and demanding it.
